title: Bloomberg Markets: Madoff Says Fraud Fault of `Big Four'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Madoff Says Fraud Fault of `Big Four'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Erik Larson U.S. Legal Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing his story on Bernie Madoff blaming the “Big Four,” his earliest and richest clients, for the biggest Ponzi scheme in U.S. history.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
